ASAPI 0.0.0.91

    • ASAPI Quick Start

    ASAPI Quick Start

    2021-02-06

    quick_start.Rmd
    library(ASAPI)
library(jsonlite)
library(kableExtra)

email = "user.example@agrospace.cl"
password = "contra1234"
auth = asapi_auth(email = email,password = password)
client = auth$client
api_key = auth$api_key
user = auth$user

    AgroSpace API

    print(auth)
    ## $client
## [1] "clientexample"
## 
## $user
## [1] "userexample"
## 
## $email
## [1] "user.example@agrospace.cl"
## 
## $api_key
## [1] "APIKEYEXAMPLE"

    Client Information

    asapi_client_get(client, email, api_key)
    ## $user_name
## [1] "Client Example"
## 
## $user
## [1] "clientexample"
## 
## $contact
## [1] "Contact Name"
## 
## $email
## [1] "client.example@agrospace.cl"
## 
## $rol
## [1] "Admin"

    User’s Information

    user = asapi_user_get(client, email, user, api_key)
counted_calls=user$counted_calls
toJSON(user,pretty = TRUE)

    Farm information

    farm = "farm1example"
shp = asapi_farm_get(client, farm, email, api_key)

    Vectorial data

    raster::plot(shp$shp)

    Retrieve tabulate time series information

    tableid = "levelzero"
sensor = "S2SR"
index = "NDVI"
date_start="2021-01-01"
date_end="2021-02-01"
table = asapi_table(client, farm, tableid, sensor, index,
                    date_start, date_end, email, api_key)
    kbl(table) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed")) %>% 
  kable_material_dark()
    date sensor granule_id client farm index sd mean
    2021-01-18 S2SR T18GXA clientexample farm1example NDVI 0.1212 0.6739
    2021-01-13 S2SR T18GXA clientexample farm1example NDVI 0.0942 0.6124
    2021-01-08 S2SR T18GXA clientexample farm1example NDVI 0.0654 0.7676

    Retrieve Satelite Data - NDVI

    date = table$date[1]
rst = asapi_image(client, farm, sensor, index, date, email,
                  api_key)
raster::plot(rst)
